Detailed Description

Simple wrapper to turn a string into an input stream.

This provides a standard interface on top of an array of characters.

Member Function Documentation

consume ( )

Get the next unconsumed character in the stream.

This will remove that character from the front of the stream and return it.

Definition at line 1086 of file CssParser.php.

isEmpty ( )

Check if the stream is empty.

Returns:
boolean Returns TRUE when the stream is empty, FALSE otherwise.

Definition at line 1098 of file CssParser.php.

peek ( )

Look ahead one character.

Returns:
char Returns the next character, but does not remove it from the stream.
